tool_description: Aspose.Cells Cloud is a REST API that enables you to perform a wide range of document processing operations including creation, manipulation, conversion and rendering of Excel documents in the cloud. You can convert your XLS and XLSX files to various other formats like PDF, HTML, ODS, XPS, CSV etc.
name: Aspose.Cells Cloud
title: Aspose.Cells Cloud

api_list.name: HcPassThrough
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aspose-cells-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/ocr/hc_full"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aspose-cells-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetRecognizeDocument

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of the file to recognize.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Language for OCR Core Aspose.OCR.Core.Transport 
                    BaseStructures.Language.LanguageGroup

optional_parameters.name: dsrMode
optional_parameters.description: An option to switch DSR algorithm

optional_parameters.name: skewCorrect
optional_parameters.description: An option to switch skew correction algorithm

optional_parameters.name: resultType
optional_parameters.description: The type of result: Text, HOCR, PDF or their combinations

schema.description: Represents information about response after OCR.

Text.description: Recognized Text if you choose ResultType.Text

Pdf.description: Recognized Text in Searchable PDF if you choose ResultType.PDF

Hocr.description: Text in the HOCR Structure data

api_list.name: DownloadFile
GetFilesList

Value.description: Files and folders contained by folder StorageFile.

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

api_list.name: ObjectExists

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

api_list.name: GetDiscUsage
GetFileVersions

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.

api_list.name: StorageExists
